title: The Task Force hosted 1st meeting
content: The Task Force hosted its first community meeting at the clubhouse. More than 30 parents attended to discuss their concerns about the proposed school boundary options.

title: Potomac Glen School Boundary Task Force formed
Potomac Glen School Boundary Task Force formed
content: Residents in Potomac Glen aligned with HOA and formed the task force. The Potomac Glen Board reached out to District 3 Board of Education Member Julie Yang and requested a meeting with her and the Potomac Glen membership.

title: Awareness of the school boundary study
content: Potomac Glen parents formed groups to study the impact of the school redistricting.
